titleStmt.title: A briefe treatice of election and reprobation with certen ansvvers to the obiections of the aduersaries of thys doctrine: vvritten by Anthonie Gylbie.
titleStmt.author: Gilby, Anthony, ca. 1510-1585.

titleStmt.title: A briefe treatice of election and reprobation with certen ansvvers to the obiections of the aduersaries of thys doctrine: vvritten by Anthonie Gylbie.
titleStmt.author: Gilby, Anthony, ca. 1510-1585.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Dauid Moptid, and Iohn Mather, dwelling in Red-crosse streete nexte adioyning to S. Gylses Church without Criplegate,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Possibly issued with: Bèze, Théodore de. A briefe declaration of the chiefe poyntes of Christian religion: London, [1575?].
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
